scripts.build:musicxml: for f in tunes/*.mscz; do ${MUSESCORE:-musescore} "$f" -o "${f/.mscz/.musicxml}"; done
scripts.build:midi: for f in tunes/*.mma; do ${MMA_HOME:-../mma}/mma.py "$f" -f "${f/.mma/.mid}"; done
scripts.build:pdf: for f in tunes/*.mscz; do ${MUSESCORE:-musescore} "$f" -o "${f/.mscz/.pdf}"; done
scripts.build: npm run build:musicxml && npm run build:pdf
